name: Super Smash Bros: Distorted Fantasy Demo v1.0.2
name_original: Super Smash Bros: Distorted Fantasy Demo v1.0.2
description:
Welcome to the demo for Super Smash Bros: Distorted Fantasy! This game has been in development for over a year, and the team is proud to finally release a playable build!

Featuring four playable characters and stages, this is already one of the largest Smash fangames out there!

|-Controls-|

The arrow keys are equivalent to the joystick, meaning left moves left, etc

Z and X are normal and special attacks, respectively

And that's it! It may take some getting used to, but this is the most convenient way to convert official Smash controls to PC.

The battlefield music is made by Superpi2 (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqJD-1hFAnfdrlqzr9izD5A)

The start screen and results music are from Rivals of Aether, although they are just placeholders and original music will be used in the final game.
